report.title: List of taxa for the ABLE app
report.description: A list of distinct taxa with names.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_samples_functional s join surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false left join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.sample_id=s.id or o.parent_sample_id=s.id left join cache_taxa_Taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id where s.website_id in (#website_ids#) and s.parent_sample_id is null and s.created_by_id=#user_id#
